clause_text: For junctions of roads meeting at less than 60 degree, the rounding off or cut-off or similar treatment shall have tangent length of U and V from the intersection point as shown in Fig.3B. The tangent length at obtuse angle junction shall be equal to half the width of the road from which the vehicle enters as shown in Fig.3B. Provided, however, that the radius for the junction rounding shall not be less than 6 m. for both types.
